column4: Looking at the US Dvorak layout, there 4 symbols on some keys. How can I use the ones that dont show when I hit a normal key or use shift?
which ones exactly?
stuff like: รก and
you probably need AltGr (you can set one up in layout preferences)
works like a charm, tnx
I don't know anything about the netbook edition, but I'll try to help.  Do you know if it uses the same repositories as ubuntu?
unsure, let me see
if it does, then we can probably just use the minimal iso and then grab the right package for netbook remix
looks like there's no such thing distributed by ubuntu?
the minimal, you mean?
here's the minimal iso: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/MinimalCD  I just don't know how to get you to unr once you have a minimal install
tnx. Though what's 'unr'?
that's the acronym I've seen for Ubuntu Netbook Remix
ah, sorry. I was hoping it's just a matter of switching desktop manager
I'm not actually sure.  I'm looking for some docs and my guess is you are right; it is that simple
I'm trying to find those dox as well. you dont happen to know what window manager that would be?
I'm starting here: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UNR
looks like the package is just "ubuntu-netbook-remix".  So if you install minimal ubuntu and then install that, you should be good to go.  Make sense?
definitely, tnx
cpuburn
tnx
